paragraphs: I’m a software developer with a background in applied chemistry. My work focuses on building reliable, thoughtful, and efficient digital experiences—from backend services and automation tools to user-facing applications.

My scientific training shaped the way I solve problems: precise, structured, and highly iterative. Today, I apply this mindset to software engineering by breaking down complexity, experimenting quickly, and designing systems that are clear and maintainable.

I enjoy working across the stack, especially on backend architecture, data automation, and AI-enhanced applications. I care about building products that feel smooth, intentional, and meaningful to the people who use them.
